mapper.select: SELECT cpq.company_id companyId , cpq.question_platform_company_title , cpq.question_platform_company_content , cpq.createdate questionCreatedate , cpa.answer_platform_company_content , cpa.createdate answerCreatedate FROM shopping_question_platform_company cpq JOIN shopping_answer_platform_company cpa ON cpq.question_platform_company_no = cpa.question_platform_company_no WHERE cpq.question_platform_company_no = #{questionPlatformCompanyNo}

SELECT cpq.company_id companyId , cpq.question_platform_company_title , cpq.question_platform_company_content , cpq.createdate createdate , cpa.answer_platform_company_content FROM shopping_question_platform_company cpq JOIN shopping_answer_platform_company cpa ON cpq.question_platform_company_no = cpa.question_platform_company_no ORDER BY cpq.createdate DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}
